dcterms:description: The Spanish Common Voice corpus is an open-source dataset that consists of recordings from volunteer contributors pronouncing scripted sentences, recorded at 48kHz rate and using their own devices. The dataset is continuously growing and aims to provide a diverse range of Spanish speech data.
dcterms:title: Spanish Common Voice

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech 100h is a dataset consisting of audio book recordings sampled at 16kHz, designed for automatic speech recognition tasks. It is based on public domain audio books and provides a benchmark for ASR systems.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech 100h
